attributes.action: To hold a public enquiry into the ownership failings of Bolton Wanderers FC.
attributes.background:
Bolton Wanderers FC are a founding member of the football league. The first team to win an FA Cup Final at Wembley, and also the first to postpone a game due to a player strike. 

Hold a public enquiry. Why was Ken Anderson allowed to own such a prestigious football club

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for. This would be the responsibility of the footballing authorities.
